_header: All nist by the rose rose
Subjects: love lyrics; songs, erotic; allegorical poems
_description: The Singer and the Rose — four lines

BodRawD913.Transcription:
Al nist be þe rose roseal nist bi the rose I laydarf ich
                    noust þe rose steleant ȝet [ich] bar þe flour
                    away
